short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows you what permissions your installed add-ons have and what URLs they have permission to access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the Toolbar Icon to open, Project Insight.

- See what permissions are granted for each extension.
- See what URLs the extension can connect to and intercept.
- A user-friendly explanation of what each permission can do when you click on it.

This extension requires the "management" permission to operate.
